entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued August 14 at 6:49PM PDT until August 15 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS THIS EVENING INTO TUESDAY MORNING... ...Mid level moisture and a hot unstable atmosphere aid in scattered thunderstorm development early this evening. In addition, gusty erratic thunderstorm winds will create dangerous fire weather
